name: Shattered Echoes
description: Shattered Echoes is a singleplayer arcade-platformer where your only enemy is yourself. Jump, dash and think two steps ahead in hectic attempts to dodge enemies that copy everything you do. Unlock versatile movement abilities and take on challenging arenas where you must outrun your past.

name: Shooting Squirrel Simulator
description: The Checkered Squirrel who shoots cool weapons and parkour through levels in slo mo.

name: Scraptail: Down the Drain
description: Join Vivian, The Rat, on her journey to become the greatest thief The Underground has ever seen. Upgrade your equipment and her bionic tail to help you with all the dangers that fill Sewer City.

name: Great Naval Battles: The Final Fury
description: Battlestations! All hands prepare for the naval conflict on a truly grand scale! Great Naval Battles: The Final Fury is loaded with enough historical and hypothetical naval conflict to keep players - from casual to connoisseur - busy for hours and hours!

name: Grudge
description:
Grudge is a fantasy-based adventure sandbox MMO!

Collect fight explore build siege and more! Alone or with friends, players can choose their own path. Clear dungeons, gather resources and explore monuments. Level up stats and skills, collect pets and mounts, fight world bosses. Obtain epic equipment and components for crafting and building. Choose a location and build your stronghold, make alliances or wage war in the open world!

name: Grunder
description: Grunder is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You will have to go through a series of dangerous locations, each of which presents a new test and challenge for your skills. On your journey you will encounter treacherous enemies. Use your fighting skills to overcome your challenge!

name: Good Morning Cruel City
description: Anime Cyberpunk Visual Novel You have a job, it's up to you how to finish it. Become a Fixer and help your client for the day navigate the underground crime world.

name: Golden Rails: Harvest of Riddles
description: A new adventure awaits in Golden Rails: Harvest of Riddles. Join the dynamic duo, Jack and Jill, as they answer the call of a mayor that is seeking help to organize a grand fair in the midst of a web of deceit, corruption and darkness.

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Animal Costume Pack
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Forza Motorsport 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT3
description: Forza Motorsport 2018 Mercedes-AMG GT3

name: Fishlets
description: Fishlets is a cute, cozy aquarium game. Care for adorable pixel fish and design charming aquatic environments for your pets to call home. Collect rare fish and color variants as you relax and nurture your underwater friends.

name: Extreme Rally Raid
description: Extreme Rally Raid is a 3D PC game, close to rally raid races experiences. Extreme races, long and strong stages, in natural environments with a lower human intervention.

name: Exiled Survivors
description: Dive into the heart-pounding world of Exiled Survivors! Experience relentless action, shape your destiny through strategic choices, and face monstrous foes. Unlock up to 30 characters, conquer bosses, and revel in the perfect blend of Vampire Survivors' intensity and Diablo's depth!

name: Duplicity Loop
description: A dark magical girl VN that takes place in an Alice in Wonderland inspired world.

name: Dokkalfheim Magical University
description: University life has never been so magical! Recruit friends, complete story quests, upgrade your equipment and skills, decorate your dorm and so much more! This exciting saga will satiate your desires for witchy themes, turned based battles and side missions!!

name: Deer God
description: 'Deer God' is a breath-taking hardcore platformer. Play as a Deer God who was sent to Hell as punishment. Jump to the top through challenging levels to seek revenge and reclaim your godly powers.

name: Dorasyeoda
description: 「Dorasyeoda」 is a 3D Mystery & Detective game set in a dystopian world, which is based on a virtual history of the Joseon Dynasty.

name: Minitechno
description: Learn. Develop. Play. For toddlers and kids of all ages.

name: Mirage: Beyond The Screen
description: Experimental cartoony adventure horror-ish experience developed on Unreal 5, where you will uncover the mysteries of haunted reality where the line between reality and computer game blurs. What will you uncover?

name: More Than Human
description: Embrace your inner beast and morph into any animal you wish to explore an incredible world.

name: Mutants & Zombies
description: Mutants & Zombies is a first-person shooter (FPS). A zombie apocalypse has occurred in the world and the survivors have to hide in safe shelters. You have to take on the role of an ordinary tramp and try to survive in this harsh world! Explore dangerous locations, kill zombies and mutants

name: Project N.E.X.T
description: "Project N.E.X.T: A dynamic 3D shooter where Red and Blue teams battle across shifting realms from quaint villages to vibrant cities. Face off in modes like Deathmatch and Survive, with an added twist of zombies. Strategy and skill reign supreme!"

name: Pinball M: The Thing Pinball
description: Immerse yourself in the thrilling and suspenseful world of Universal Pictures' classic film - The Thing. Use your pinball skills and battle against the shape-shifting alien through the arctic chill of U.S. Outpost #31. Can you trust anyone, even yourself?

name: Pinball M: Dead by Daylight Pinball
description: Step into the realm of horror with Dead by Daylight Pinball. Become the hunter or even the hunted in a thrilling fusion of classic pinball and the excitement of one of the most popular horror games ever created.

name: Pinball M: Chucky's Killer Pinball
description: After you play, you'll wish Chucky's Killer Pinball was only make-believe! Step into a twisted realm where the innocent becomes sinister, and the playful turns menacing. Navigate through an eerie playfield where Chucky lurks in the shadows, ready to pounce.

name: Home Defender
description: Home Defender is an adventure game where you play as a young boy who is alone in his home at a winter night. Your goal is to protect your home from two burglars who are trying to get you.

name: Hands of Necromancy II
description: “Hands of Necromancy 2” is a sequel to the original “Hands of Necromancy” game; a dark fantasy first-person shooter that draws parallels with games like “Heretic” and “Doom”. As a player, you’ll discover various weapons and unique transformation abilities to combat the monsters you encounter.

name: Into The G.R.I.D.
description: Dive into the neon-lit virtual world as a hacker detective fighting rebellious AI programs, inspired by the "Tron" movie. Unleash hacking skills in a 'Minesweeper'-style game with RPG elements, save the virtual world from chaos while questioning who you are - human or another AI?

name: Metal Rampage Uprising
description: Metal Rampage: Uprising is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Plunge into the exciting world of the future, where humanity is in danger from an army of destructive robots. You, in the role of a highly effective combat robot, have become humanity's last hope for salvation.

name: Math is Horror
description: 'Math is Horror' is a math based horror game where you must answer equations to unlock doors in an attempt to escape The Math Clown! Stuck in an asylum where the equations grow more difficult, How many rooms can you survive?

name: Magic Scroll
description: Magic Scroll is an addictive game based on physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures with a pickaxe! In the game you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty. Control your pickaxe and destroy everyone on your way!

name: Last Minute Shopping
description: Last Minute Shopping is a chaotic “first-person shopper” where players must face one of mankind’s most difficult tasks: Getting lost in a legally distinct furniture store. Filled to the brim with wacky physics, procedurally generated layouts, and Swedish!

name: Kurofune: Descobrimentos Portugueses
description: A resource management and decision making complex game focused on Portuguese culture.

name: Katana Robo: RTA
description: Katana Robo fights his way to the top floor of the Robot Tower, which looks like a platformer game stage, to thwart Samurai Robo's ambitious plan to use the Dominion Sphere at the top of the Robot Tower to control the robots throughout the universe.

name: Jumpfox: Always Running
description: Jumpfox: Always Running is an intense precision platformer where control is key - but not over running. Jump and dash through rigorous courses, as you automatically run and change direction at walls. Ideal for both challenging solo play and exciting local multiplayer.

name: House of Jigsaw: Spooky Halloween
description: The Spooky Halloween expansion for House of Jigsaw: Happy Puzzling, Happy Home is a must-have for horror enthusiasts and puzzle fanatics alike.

name: Hydroplane: Riptide Racers
description: Hydroplane: Riptide Racers is a fast paced arcade racer. Race through the canal streets of Nautica to earn parts and piece together your ideal speed boat. Blast, jet, float, navigate, and dominate your way to first place to unlock equipment to play how you want.

name: Danger Drone
description: Return the world to humanity by destroying the evil aliens

name: Cosmic Rollers: Orbital Odyssey
description: Embark on an infinite, thrilling journey through the depths of space in Cosmic Rollers Orbital Odyssey! Navigate a mesmerizing golden transparent trail as you roll your boulder through the cosmic expanse, dodging other boulders in a challenging and never-ending adventure.

name: Cosmic Horizons: Path of the Wanderer
description: Cosmic Horizons is a third-person, story rich adventure game. You play as Ethan Nelson, a seemingly ordinary man, whose faith is about to change. You must embark on a journey, that will require every skill you possess in order to save your life, and just maybe, reunite with your best friend.

name: Clamb
description: A punishing VR climbing game. Climb a surreal mountain with nothing but a hammer.

name: Bullwagon Business
description: Smash the reins and set off in a bull-drawn wagon to explore the beautiful countryside, have adventures, but most of all, trade. But don't expect it to be easy. There are bandits and other vermin everywhere, and if you don't fight them off, you'll lose them! Get in!

name: American Truck Simulator: Farm Machinery
description: Saddle up drivers, because the Farm Machinery DLC for American Truck Simulator has arrived! Transport everything from trusty tractors to forage harvesters and mobile silos across scenic virtual highways and roads.

name: Brain Urge
description: Brain Urge is a real-time strategy game where you attack a human base on the side of zombies. The human base is reliably defended by military equipment, and at the sight of zombies. Plan your attack carefully, use the capabilities of several types of zombies and strive to defeat all of humanity.

name: Bobos FunZone
description: Step into the haunting realm of Bobo's Funzone, in this horror/puzzle adventure. Your mission: find your daughter, who was attending a birthday party here. Navigate the eerie corridors, unearth what happend, and be careful and cautious as Bobo is about.

name: Blouncy
description: Be a block! Do the bounce! Don't Die!

name: Blocked In
description: Blocked In brings the nostalgia of the classic pen and paper game "Dots and Boxes" into the digital era, offering lively gameplay for players of all ages. The objective remains simple – players take turns adding lines between adjacent dots to create boxes, earning points with each completed square.

name: Beat 'N' Path
description: Combine creativity and logic to create machines… that create music! Take on exciting challenges in Career Mode, or experiment in Sandbox Mode.

name: Bondman of Traps
description: Bondman of Traps is a challenging survival obstacle course game. There is no limit to dying in this game. Solve the traps, improve your reflexes, and pass through them one by one. Traps will harm you and cause you to start over. Either you become a prisoner of traps or the master of traps...

name: Bear Jojo
description: Embark on a whimsical adventure with Bear JoJo in this all-ages arcade game. Enjoy challenging gameplay and discover enchanting surprises along the way!

name: Tailbound
description:
Tailbound is a lewd top-down 2D hack n' slash game. The game features Zelda-like gameplay, but at a far faster pace and with more of a focus on abilities and level hazards. Gameplay is based around an improved version of Thirstchasm's topple system & combat.

The game has 29 fully-animated Sex Scenes, with the sole focus of Male on Male content. Not to mention, 4 levels, 7 enemies, and a multitude of secrets, easter eggs, and lore scattered about.

name: Thirstchasm
description: Thirstchasm is a Hack N' Slash lewd furry roguelike, featuring solely animated M/M sex scenes.

name: Arcade Archives: Scramble Formation
description:
Scramble into the skies of Tokio!
Master the formation change!

name: 2045, Tsuki yori.
description: Sin descripción

name: Treat Maze
description: He's so angry...

name: RE: Crank Sim
description: Sin descripción

name: Megami Tensei: Neuroheroine
description:
Megami Tensei: Neuroheroine is free fan-made game of Megami Tensei series. This game is free, and for personal use only, not for sale or redistribution. All the rights for Megami Tensei trademarks belong to ATLUS company.
Year 20XX, Neo Tallado City. During the renaissance of biotechnology, the heroine belongs to a group of people who deny body augmentation. In search of a better life, she decides to partake in the Tournament – virtual reality “Devil Busters” games hosted by a multibillionaire François Curbault. At the same time, a serial killer appears in the city and the heroine begins her investigation of best friend’s murder. Megami Tensei: Neuroheroine is the cyberpunk detective story with many moral choices and decisions.

name: Hyper Olympic
description: The original Japanese version of Track & Field had an official license from the 1984 Summer Olympics.

name: Hyper Olympic '84
description: The original version of Hyper Sports, which beared a license from the 1984 Olympic Games.

name: Hyper Olympic: Gentei-ban!
description: A special edition of the game Hyper Olympic (Famicom), replacing some sprites.

name: Last Train Home: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Snow Bros. 2 Special
description: Snow Bros. 2 Special is a remake of the 1994 arcade game Snow Bros. 2 by ToaPlan. It features new graphics, new stages, new game modes such as Time Attack, Survival, and Sky Run, and supports local and online multiplayer for up to four players. Players can also enjoy the original version of Snow Bros. 2, as the original score was one of the most popular requests from players.

name: Sumio Mondo Namaz Simulator
description: Sumio Mondo Namaz Simulator is a rpgmaker game created by Sadgeta. The game was made using RPGMaker MZ.An rpgmaker game about praying and living the day of Sumio Mondo from Kill the Past series

name: Hyper Sports
description: Amstrad CPC port of Hyper Sports.

name: Hyper Sports
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper Sports
description:
Six tough events await in this joystick-waggling successor to Track &Field.

The full sequence of events is - swimming, skeet shooting, gymnastics, archery, triple jumping and weightlifting. You must complete each event in order to be allowed onto the next one.

Swimming involves moving left and right as fast as possible, while pressing fire when a breath is required. Skeet shooting and archery both come down to timing - though elevation and wind factors affect the latter. Gymnastics involves timing a succession of presses to ensure that the jump is long and the landing graceful. The triple jump involves one press for each part of the jump, whereas the weightlifting involves merely brute strength.

If the player wants to go to the next event or round, they will have to qualify by beating increasingly difficult maximum times or minimum targets.

name: Hyper Sports
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper Sports
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper Sports
description: Hyper Sports is a sports game originally developed by Konami, which was ported and published for the SG-1000 by Sega in 1985. The game has the player compete through a number of Olympic events.

name: Hyper Sports
description: Hyper Sports is the Famicom port of the arcade original. This port notably uses the international title as Konami's Olympic video game licensee was up a year after the Olympic Games Los Angeles 1984 happened.

name: Head-On Soccer
description: This port has minor changes from more animated intro, to different sound/music due to hardware, and minor graphical changes.

name: Mushbits
description: Click and drag to select a path for each bunny. Unite them with their like-colored mushrooms. Bunnies can only move on platforms of the same color, co-operate to find a way towards victory.

name: VFurrika!
description:
VFurrika! is an addictive puzzle game that combines the charm of your favourite VFur streamers with strategic gameplay.
Drop your favorite furry VTuber into a glass and witness them merging into other VTubers upon contact!

name: Lie In My Heart
description: How would you react to your child's mother ending her own life? Would you make the same choices I made? Would you feel the same regret? How would you support your child through this painful moment of life?

name: Puzzmo
description: The (new) place for thoughtful puzzles. From award-winning game designer Zach Gage and engineer Orta Therox, along with Hearst Newspapers, Puzzmo is a fresh spin on a cultural mainstay: the newspaper games page.

name: Dwarf Fortress: Adventure Mode
description:
Adventure Mode is the RPG mode of Dwarf Fortress, where you can create a character and freely roam the rich simulated world you have made a home in during your Fortress Mode save or start fresh in a newly generated world.
Adventure Mode holds limitless possibilities for player stories: Write a poem and recite it in front of unsuspecting tavern-goers, join the group of hearth warriors of a local village to solve local problems, rob a tomb and become cursed by a mummy. This and so much more!

name: Unrailed 2: Back on Track
description: Unrailed is back on track with more co-op railroad construction chaos! Choose your path in a new world packed with bold biomes and bosses. Permanently upgrade your character and engines, even create and share your own levels - just don‘t let your train derail!

name: Galactic Core
description: Galactic Core is a turn-based strategy game centered on the theme of space warfare. It comes with six campaigns, each for one of the six species featured in the game, plus a campaign editor. It can also generate random levels and has the option of playing multiplayer games via email.

name: Wild Bastards
description: The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy.

name: Republic of Pirates
description: Establish and grow a pirate utopia during the Golden Age of Piracy. Create a resource-based economy, engage in real-time naval combat, and navigate diplomatic relationships with rival powers. Explore the far reaches of the Caribbean in search of the ultimate fortune and glory…

name: DarkwebStreamer
description: You? An occult streamer on an alternate 90s internet. Your goal? Become #1. The problem? The supernatural is REAL. Manage your stream, do weird rituals, make weird friends and experience a different story every time in this procedurally-generated psycho-horror RPG streaming sim.

developers.name: We Have Always Lived In The Forest

name: Drowned Lake
description: Dredge up the secrets hidden beneath Drowned Lake in this horror fishing adventure. Investigate the dark waters to fish out the truth. Catch evidence. Do not get caught yourself.

name: Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator
description: Dedicate your life to saving others. As soon as you receive the emergency call, speed off to the site of the accident in your ambulance, sirens wailing. Apply first aid and transport the seriously injured to hospital. Every second counts!

name: Kingdom of Cards
description: Kingdom of Cards is a hybrid roleplay simulation game. With different focuses, each playthrough is different and is affected by the citizens of the town, and events to come, along with the depth of economy, cards, exploration, roles and events. There is much to learn, and much to master. With online play being implemented in 2023, the game is played both offline and online and take part to compete to succeed in a harsh world.

name: Arena of Taryon
description: Arena of Taryon is a classic pixel roguelike experience with an immersive story and fun, challenging gameplay! Want to focus on the lore and discover the secrets of our world? Or do you prefer combat and action over dialogue? The choice is yours and you may pick both!

name: Mais um Dia!
description: Explore a 3D world with hand-drawn animated 2D characters. Witness the mundane daily life of the future. Talk with the inhabitants of the sector and discover their stories.

name: From the Psychothread
description:
You are Jeanne Delacroix, an awakened prisoner.
Your prison cell has just been opened and you don't know why.
Explore the prison, understand what is happening, fight and survive.
You must free yourself.

name: Ocaso
description: Ocaso is a difficult combat focused action game with only boss fights, inspired by Furi and Titan Souls.

name: Jamie Inside
description:
You've kidnapped a girl and sudden guests arrive at your house.
Distract and smooth talk them, so your visitors doesn't get bored or suspicious.
Don't let anyone find out what's inside your wardrobe!

name: Soul's Remnant
description: "Soul's Remnant" is a social and player-driven 2D platformer MMORPG.

name: Zombotron
description:
Welcome to the planet «Zombotron», inhabited by human-mutants or just stupid zombies. Nobody knows where they come from and what they eat. But we know one thing – they are ready to destroy everything that moves.

During the colonization of the planet people built several laboratories to create bio-robots to clean the planet from evil, but something was wrong. There was no people on the planet Zombotron, but those laboratories still operate under the computer’s control.

You are one of the few bio-robots and so will you be able to complete this mission?

name: Akahane: After Class
description:
It's after classes today at Akahane Academy! Usually this is the time for students to go home or participate in club activities... However you're the teacher's assistant in class 1-B, and Takahashi-sensei wants you to stay for a little while...?

It smells like nothing but alcohol and sadness in his room! Why today? Maybe he has something to ask you... As new staff it's your duty to find out!

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Mavado Kameo
description:
Mavado, a commanding leader of the merciless Red Dragon Clan, returns to the Mortal Kombat Universe.

Purchase this pack and receive Mavado as a Kameo Character to assist you in fight.

name: Zombotron 2
description: A good zombie – it’s a dead zombie. Agree? Then you’re not mistaken with the address. You will have a chance to test it in practice. Destroy all zombies. Destroy all other enemies. And save the planet. The planet Zombotron! You won’t see a shortage of weapons and ammunition. Forward! God of War is on your side.

name: Smoked Fish and Cabbage 2
description:
This romhack was created to test the player’s skill, patience and reflexes. It presents challenges difficult enough that a standard player may struggle, but indicators throughout are in place to help guide you to the goal. It's difficulty is between kaizo beginner-intermediate and players can expect to beat it within 1-4 hours depending on skillset.

This hack makes use of some more complicated tech that may be unfamiliar to the casual player- blue coins are in place to indicate spin jumps and green coins indicate item throws (usually shells). Color palettes and graphic choices were carefully picked to match the setting and create a tone for each level. Every level’s soundtrack was also carefully selected in an effort to create a satisfying gameplay loop as the player grinds each of the 28 courses. The map is comprised of several different zones strung together to feel like a complete world. Levels do not have a difficulty curve as there are plenty of ‘palette cleansers’ throughout. This design choice was decided to give the player a chance to breathe and continue progressing without wanting to destroy their controller in frustration after a lengthy grind.

name: Zombotron 2: Time Machine
description: Don’t let the name fool you, zombies in Zombotron are ruthless and clever as ever, they will keep coming at you until they are completely disabled. Zombotron Time Machine is a new entry in the Zombotron universe and delivers engaging gameplay and story.

name: Boris
description: A hack by Sockbat Replica with 52 exits. It took about a year to finish.

name: Watch Mario
description:
Gameplay style is an unaudited presentation of Mario assessing & orienting 'framework gameplay' with dynamic simplicity.

This hack has 77 exits and was made by BabyCan.

name: Super Mallow World
description:
This hack was dedicated to a Twitch streamer known as Glitchcat7. It's been a colossal collaborative effort from the members of his community, to create one awesome fun game starring his cat, Mallow! And, to accompany him on his journey should you choose 2 player mode, a purple feline known as Zs (based off one of his emotes) comes along for the ride.

Mallow the Cat just wants salmon, unfortunately there is no salmon at home, so he ventures out to go find the salmon! There's plenty of secrets and challenges, plenty of custom ASM, yet it keeps a homage to the classic Mario vibe.

We hope you enjoy the hack as much as we enjoyed making it!

name: A Super Mario Thing
description: A Super Mario World collaboration hack with 94 exits, made by the Talkhaus community in the style of the VIP and Wall Mix series.

name: The Artifacts of Marvelous Birds
description:
Finally, after 10 years of working on this project, exit1337 is able to present the 3rd (and last) demo of The artifacts of marvelous birds - or short: Taomb

Expect a mysterious adventure through tropical islands, dubious fields, haunted forests and icy areas.
Please keep in mind that the first two worlds are really old, though some parts of levels have been revamped. The great quality of this hack definitely lies within later worlds, so don't quit too soon!
This hack starts out really easy, but gets harder and harder as you progress. World 4 and 5 do get challenging.

name: The First SMW Hack that will Ever be so Lucky as to Gain the Luxury of Leaving My PC
description: DynastyLobster's first public hack

name: Zeldara's Glitch City
description:
Most SMW hacks are designed to feel like new games that just happen to be based off of SMW. This hack is just the opposite.

Zeldara's Glitch City is intended to be a very strange, unconventional, and otherwise confusingly random hack, that deliberately exploits unusual aspects of the SMW engine (as well as the fact that most SMW hack players are quite familiar with the original SMW's levels) to its advantage. (It also intends to showcase various little-used edits that are possible in SMW hacks.)

name: Alyssa's Unlikely Trap
description:
Alyssa's Unlikely Trap is a darker, alternate-timeline retake on the original SMW. You can expect it to vaguely retain the original SMW locations and gameplay, but... corrupted, in many ways. (Just who is this mysterious Alyssa the Boo? Tee hee hee...)

While there is a bit more storyline than your average Mario game, this is still primarily a level design hack.

name: StreamWare
description: In StreamWare, you have the unique opportunity to be both the star streamer and the avid viewer. Dive into a universe filled with fun and dynamic mini-games that will connect you in an unparalleled way with your favorite streamer or your loyal Twitch audience.

name: Mario's Peregrination: Kingdom Elementum Phantasia
description:
Mario embarks on phantasmagorical peregrination through multifarious realms, possessing symbolic elementum. To hopefully bring glorious cessation by defeating devilish lordific presences in they're looming chateau's.

This hack was made by Vamperumbra and has 48 exits

name: Little Red Memories
description: Bonnie, a young woman struggling with traumatic memories of her past, begins to find herself in a strange, dangerous world that's set out to kill her no matter what. Will she be able to permanently escape this unfamiliar world and the horrors from her memories along the way? Or will she succumb to the darkness of The Parallel and meet her end?

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Mudrock Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Kazdel civilization with its leader Mudrock.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique units (Senior Operator-Mudrock & Mudrock Colossus)
- Unique district (Homeland)
- Unique resource (Stone)
- Increases the amount of natural disasters that happen in the match
- And much more!

name: Pinball M: Death Save Bundle
description: Get ready to tilt into terror with one convenient bundle! Get all launch tables for Pinball M with a discount and draw first blood on the leaderboards.

name: Furi Demake: The Chain
description: Fight your way free in this 8-bit-inspired version of Furi's first boss fight against The Chain. Frantic action, nervous controls, a blend of shoot and sword fight reimagined in 90s style. Only 1 boss fight! A gift to Furi's fans.

description: "Ximen Lizhi Biography" is a plot development management simulation game with multiple story clues. The main axis of the game is to cultivate Ximen Qing, the male master in the book, who must improve different abilities through various activities or courses in the limited life of the protagonist.

description: You play as a retired rally racing car, transported to a different world where you gain a soul. There, you encounter goblins, dwarves, elves, and tree spirits, embarking on thrilling adventures alongside them!
