description: A Reality single play FPS game set in World War II! This time, the airborne forces will be in action in Operation Overlord! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons!

name: Stone Age
description:
Stone Age is a 2D action game.
Control a primitive man and command your companions to gather fruits and vegetables and hunt animals.
If the level goes up, the primitive man will power up. Weapons will gradually increase.
Increase the number of friends, defeat strong enemies, and develop the village!

name: Mechanical Tralp
description: Mechanical Trap is a 2D horizontal tower defense game with gravity effects, with a variety of defense towers to collect and use together, a rich map, each enemy has a different way of restraining, and each defense tower has a different function.It's challenging. Do you dare to accept the challenge?

name: G Warrior
description: G Warrior is a retro hardcore action shooting game. Pick up the gun and destroy all robots and aliens. Fight in colorful scenes such as snowy mountains, caves, seas of fire, alien lairs, etc.! !

name: Hawked: Ruby Raider Pack
description: Uncover the hidden treasures of X-Isle with the Ruby Raider Pack. Includes a new Weapon Skin, Backpack, Hoverboard, and Traverser!

name: Mr Flippers Out For Vengeance
description: Slap your way through rooms of enemies and explore an unusual castle while trying to rescue your captured wife and take vengeance on the one who took her.

name: Eldgear
description: Live a grand adventure as an agent of "Eldia", an organization sealing ancient ruins!

name: Incantation
description: "Incantation" is a first-person horror mystery game adapted from a movie of the same name. The game reveals the chilling story behind "Chen Village" from the movie. A mother searching for her missing daughter accidentally stumbles into a village filled with mysterious cults. Beyond the palpable madness and fear in the village, there's a sinister force that drives one to despair. What happens when one crosses the forbidden line of this evil deity?

name: Cocked and Loaded
description: Cocked and Loaded is a fast paced local multiplayer party game for up to four players. With simple controls, players will learn to shoot, melee, and dodge incoming attacks effectively within the first few matches. More dedicated players will be glad to hear there can be a high skill ceiling as well.

name: Does It Stack?: Full Stack Edition
description: Get even more creative in Does It Stack? - Full Stack Edition — a physics-based VR puzzle game with an explosive twist! Craft increasingly absurd towers that joyfully defy the laws of physics using a treasure trove of wonky stuff.

name: Tresure Hunter
description: Treasure Hunter is a VR first-person adventure thriller game. Designed with the unique capabilities of virtual reality in mind, the game allows players to inhabit the spine-chilling world of Tresure Hunter and interact with terrifying devices.

name: Rune in the Three Kingdoms
description: The game currently adopts Diablo-like gameplay and data. the concepts of anger system, general system, and attack distance have been emphasized. In order to enhance the game experience, the levels and values ​​required for some data have been modified.

name: The First Present
description: For this christmas you want to please your mother with the greatest gift. Gather your courage and explore this uncanny forest to find your objective. But be carefull of your environment, do not loose too much time and find your way back before IT catch you !

name: 28 Babes Later
description: Play as a determined survivor navigating a zombie-infested world to rescue your 28 girlfriends. Armed with love and an arsenal of weapons, you must battle hordes of the undead. Will your love conquer the apocalypse?

name: Amidst The Haze
description: Enter a world where survival becomes a lethal game. In "Amidst The Haze", your simple trip to the supermarket turns into a terrifying nightmare when a thick, unfathomable fog engulfs the city, isolating the supermarket as the only safe haven.

name: Mimic Search
description: Mimic Search is a short indie horror game, in which you take the role of a police officer investigating recent mimic sightings.

name: PolyZen Drive
description: Embark on a personalized driving odyssey in PolyZen Drive. Control every aspect to match your mood, navigate serene or bustling open-world maps, and immerse yourself in a melodic journey with dynamic radio stations. Your road, your rules; take charge of the gameplay and define your drive.

name: Spellz: Mastery or Death
description: Spellz is a medieval rogue-lite where deep mastery of your spells and split-second decisions are essential to survival. Your arduous training will call for dexterity, parrying, dodging and, above all, hundreds upon hundreds of deaths... to unlock a whole range of new spells and runes.

name: Fae Farm: Coasts of Croakia
description: Fae Farm: Coasts of Croakia, is launching on December 14, 2023. With the help of a new magical croaking friend, find your way to a whole new realm to explore, with exciting encounters and discoveries. This DLC is included in the Deluxe Edition of Fae Farm.

name: Shrines of Power
description: Dive into the magic-infused world of Shrines of Power, a fast-paced FPS where strategic mastery and mystical abilities collide. Protect your shrines, outsmart your foes, and experience thrilling battles across unique maps. Unleash your dominance in this captivating blend of action and strategy.

name: Heartshot
description: Heartshot is a story driven VR espionage thriller where fast, chaotic gunplay meets retro-inspired cinematic environments. Armed with high-tech magnet gloves, seize weapons from fallen enemies and manipulate your environment as you make your way through a mysterious subterranean complex.

name: Brittle
description: Defend against pirates, bats in "Brittle" by cannon shots. Navigate physics twists, face obstacles. Precise shots through 40 levels for success!

name: The Cadet Files: Scene Unseen
description: Navigate crime scenes in 'The Cadet Files: Scene Unseen', using your tablet to solve puzzles and find hidden objects. Test your detective skills in a world of intrigue! Unravel mysteries, master new challenges, and progress through levels to become a top agent in this thrilling adventure.

name: Captain Hardcore
description: Board your ship and explore the darkest reaches of the universe in search of the Ultimate Pleasure Device, all in the name of science! Build your crew, customize their looks, and conduct sexual research and experiments on them. Become the most outstanding sexual explorer in the cosmos!

name: Vector Zone
description: In Vector Zone you see yourself stuck in a world ravaged by an apocalyptic outbreak, humanity struggles to survive amidst a relentless horde of zombies.

name: Impossible Road 2
description: A pure, minimal arcade game about risk, reward, and rollercoasters. Hurtle down the track at breakneck speeds in search of the perfect line. Earn mutations to change the game in surprising ways, and mix and match them to create your own unique challenges. Sequel to the award-winning classic.

name: Speed Night
description: Late at night, a young driver was driving his beloved sports car on the road. When he passed a bus stop, I found a girl being bullied by some hooligans. He stopped the car...

name: CipherCraft: Cyber Guardian Introduction
description: Immerse yourself in the strange world of CipherCraft: CGI, where you'll perform repairs, network infiltration, programming, server management, active server administration, and meticulous assembly and cleaning of computer components. Win against an Anonymous hacker who keeps sabotaging the company.

name: Dirt And Flo
description: Travel accross a peaceful land To reach your spaceship resolving puzzles by switching beetween Dirt and Flo, two extra terrestial lifeform from outer space wich have some problems with their flying saucer and get the time of visiting Earth.

name: Crash Test Idiots 2: Multiplayer
description: Crash Test Idiots 2: Multiplayer - You and Your Steam Friends must Destroy every car in the city.

name: Squirrel Day
description: Squirrel Day is a non-violent VR platforming game that lets you climb, explore, and collect nuts through the eyes of a squirrel using an intuitive, physics-based movement system.

name: Shelf
description: Welcome to Shelf's mysterious library! Time to find a way to get out of here, it can't be that difficult. Am I right?

name: Scary Mine VR
description: "Scary Mine" is an immersive virtual reality horror game that plunges players into the eerie confines of an abandoned mine. With realistic graphics, spine-chilling sound effects, and split-second decision-making, players will unravel the unknown horrors lurking in the darkness.

name: Renxia
description: This is a challenging action duel game, you will play as an unknown origin of chivalrous expert travel around the ancient Chinese land, to find the former legend of the sword, and gradually solve the mystery of their own origins.

name: Seekers of Eclipse
description: Lead your people back to the homeland! To do that you need to make it in time for the Eclipse. Choose your leader and build towns to defeat obstacles in this roguelike city builder with deck building mechanics.

name: The Curse of the Egyptian Pyramid: Remaster Edition
description: A first-person horror game about Egypt. Explore the scary secret of the mysterious pyramid. In order to protect the heroes from danger, the player can use the characters' cameras to see a ghostly entity and anomalies invisible to the human eye.

name: Christmas Yarn 2
description: Soak in the match-3 magic and holiday cheer with Christmas Yarn 2! Play enchanting puzzles, decorate your Christmas tree with trophies, and have a jolly good time!

name: Sudoku XP
description: Sudoku with board editing capabilities.

name: Casino Boss Simulator
description: Casino Boss Simulator is a casino management simulation game that turns your dream of building a casino empire from scratch into reality. Manage, expand, and lead your own casino empire in the competitive world of gambling.

name: Summon My Girl
description: This is a puzzle puzzle type of casual games, through the collection of love, to summon their own beloved girl.

name: Flipping in the air
description: In a world where coins can be tossed to generate resources, win more coins, customize higher-yielding  piggy banks, and reveal the secrets of "money begets money" along the way

name: I'm the Policeman
description: Immerse yourself in the gripping world of law enforcement with "I'm the Policeman."

name: Wanting Wings
description: At Seiyou Girls' academy, there are rumors of an angel. Roommates Hina, Rin, and Fumi all have completely different personalities, but they all experienced 1 strange event: They all once saw an angel in their youth. They gradually begin to suspect that one of their roommates might be that angel.

name: Dangerous Coins
description: Dangerous Coins is an exciting game that puts you in the shoes of a character who is obsessed with collecting coins.

name: Divine Doubt
description:
"I can give you that which you desire most. Your humanity."

This was all that was promised to Callum Röttwell in the mysterious email he received out of the blue one day. It was enough though for him to uproot his life and travel to the city of Starhaven to start anew. As an angel from a small town, he has to adapt quickly and learn how to interact with those he's never encountered before: demons. Especially since he must share a bedroom with one in a cramped apartment. Throughout this journey, Callum will meet many characters, explore the city of Starhaven, and dive deeper into what that strange email entails for him. But he must be wary, for his goddess is watching closely.

name: Crack it!
description: Crack it! is a fun and challenging game that puts you in the shoes of a recycling plant worker.

name: Bistro Blitz
description: Work with a friend to feed the hungry customers at your bistro, but be mindful of keeping them happy.

name: Auto Tow Truck Simulator
description: "Auto Tow Truck Simulator" is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the shoes of a tow truck driver in a busy city.

name: Cannot Contain
description: Cannot Contain is a horror game set in an underground containment facility with point-and-click style elements combined with free-roam. As a new security guard, you must maintain the facility and ensure the containment of all residents, while also trying not to die in the process...

name: Bugger Off!
description: The fun and refreshing tower defense, tasked with controlling and commanding a squadron of specially trained frogs, your mission is to thwart the relentless bug invasion. Brace yourself, as each wave increases in difficulty with bosses that tanks damage for days.

name: Damaaz the Barbarian Warlock
description: Damaaz The Barbarian Warlock is a single player fast-paced Beat 'em Up action game with unique, comic style line art. Inspired by Sword and Sorcery, plunge into the dark fantasy world of Damaaz the Barbarian Warlock.

name: Kill Invaders
description: Dive into a thrilling multiplayer FPS with an alien storyline. Defend Earth in a battle against extraterrestrial invaders!

name: The Caped Crusader
description: This is an exciting medieval adventure in which the hero, The Caped Crusader, takes on the King's Guard in an effort to give back to the poor the gold coins the King has unfairly collected from poor tenants. The goal of the game is to take as many bags of gold as possible from the King's Guard.

name: Supernormal
description: Inspired by Allison Road. SUPERNORMAL is a psychological horror game set in a seemingly ordinary apartment harboring dark secrets. Play as Detective Wyatt, tasked with unravelling the disappearance of Masato Sakamoto's daughter. Search for clues and unravel the sinister truth.

name: Owl Observatory
description: Embark on a surreal, time-looping journey in this horror comedy point-and-click adventure with a delicious twist. Eternity begins now: At the Owl Observatory!

name: Wartales: Pirates of Belerion
description: Discover a land unlike anything you’ve seen with the first expansion to the world of Wartales! Unravel the secrets of the new region's storyline, discover new factions and master the new way to travel: navigation.

name: Feed It Souls
description: A metroidvania for the GBC

name: Born of Bread: Baker Edition
description:
Born of Bread is a wacky and joyful RPG Adventure, revisiting turn-based combat tropes.
Play as Loaf, a flour-golem discovering this enchanting world full of humor, along with a colorful cast of buddies.

The Baker Edition includes:
- Born of Bread
- Digital Artbook & OST

name: Wargame Construction Set Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Choo Choo Crossing
description: I'm crossin here!

name: Dark Cavern
description: Dark Cavern is a maze-based shooting game by M Network for the Atari 2600 console. It is a port of the game Night Stalker for the Intellivision.

name: LIve Pict
description: Sin descripción

name: The Da Vinci Cryptex 2
description: Take the challenge again and crack 50 new incredible riddles in the sequel of The Da Vinci Cryptex!

name: Tyrannical Chickens
description: Chickens have started a despotic uprising in this 2D shooter, and you are tasked with putitng it down. Buy guns, upgrade them, kill chickens - and die. Over. And over. And over.

name: Word Warrior: Zombie Typocalypse
description: Defeat zombies with creativity! "Word Warrior: Zombie Typocalypse" is a wacky word-based rail shooter. Type anything you can think of to fight off the zombies and top the global leaderboard. Replay for bigger rewards but face deadlier zombies!

name: Aliya
description: You accidentally connect with a girl in space who is in distress 1000 years later... How will you solve the crisis and discover the truth?

name: What's Outside
description: You’re stuck out in the middle of space alone in ship, see how long you can survive with endless enemy ships and do all it again.

name: Isabella: Chasing Shadows
description: Isabella - Chasing Shadows is an erotic thriller with adult elements. Consumed, after the death of your fiancée, you’ll try to uncover the city’s darkest secrets. What connection does a ‘High Fashion’ model have to your fiancée’s death and can you protect those you care about? It’s up to you!

name: My Anima Boy
description: A short visual novel depicting the struggles and romantic entanglements of a composer attempting to write lyrics for the first time in his life. It's a BL (Boys' Love) story.

name: Neon Fantasy: Predators
description: Neon Fantasy: Predators is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Neuro Hacker
description: "Neuro Hacker" is a VR game that combines escape room and detective puzzle elements.You will play as a "detective" skilled in hacking into people's minds and solving complex cases. You are about to enter the brain of a survivor of a plane crash, and uncover the dark truth behind the case.

name: Operator Ace's Simple Infinite Survival
description: O.A.S.I.S is a simple wave based Zombie survival shooter, that combines the best elements of classic arcade-style shooters with the atmosphere of an alternate 80's dystopian world. Just relax and Have some fun, Solo or with up to 3 friends.

name: Gaia's Blessing
description: Gaia's Blessing is a casual deck building farming simulator with hundred of cards for you to discover and use. Plan, Plant, and Profit as you build up your personal card collection. Help develop the so-called card tech and discover the truth behind it all!

name: Diabetor & The Sugar Monsters
description: DIABETOR AND THE SUGAR MONSTERS! Diabetor was wreaking havoc on diabetics across the nation. The world needed a hero! Years ago the Insulator read a book that held the secret on how to defeat Diabetor. It is now time to defeat Diabetor and his evil sugar monsters!

name: Cute girl with uncle's leisure time
description: A magical girl just learned fire magic. Fresh out of prison, she is eager to show her strength. It happened that an uncle in the next village had a good relationship with her. Prepare to challenge her. They prepare to fight in four magic forbidden places. See if you can conquer this old man?

name: Citizen Zein
description: A narrative role-playing game with Point'n'click elements, where every choice will have consequences. Set priorities correctly. It's up to you to decide what is really important and what can be sacrificed. Principles, friends, loved ones, own well-being. Bets are made! There are no more bets!

name: Back To School
description: 《Back to School》 is a first-person open-world campus game where you can study hard to get scholarships and participate in sports activities such as basketball, football, swimming, and more. Of course, you can also do something that you haven't experienced in campus life before.

name: Deep In The Snowy Night 2
description: After drunkenly passing out on a sidewalk, Christopher wakes up in yet another nightmare. Venture through the many different zones to uncover the truth behind these strange nightmares.

name: Call of Farming: Together
description: Call of Farming: Together is a farming simulation where you can create your own farm online with your friends.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Mona Megistus Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Mondstant civilization with its Leader Mona Megistus.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique units (Reconnaissance Company & Astrologer)
- Unique building (The Temple of the Star Latitudes)
- Unique district (Favonius Stronghold)
- Changes how science is gained for every player in the match
- And much more!

name: Polyhop: The Skybound Islands
description: Polyhop is a platforming game. Jump across the sky islands of a broken world, traverse through numerous hazards, and reactivate ancient pillars to pull the world together.

name: Detourist
description: Atmospheric exploration game in which the protagonist's body emits light and warmth. A feature that will both limit and assist them as they venture through uncharted terrain.

name: The Bou: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Liam FitzRoy Kills Everyone: The Game Part Zero
description: Liam FitzRoy kills everyone The game Part Zero is a 2d shooter with enemies that will attack you in their own way while you have dialogues, choose different endings and try to understand why you are shooting at them.

name: A Story About Farting
description: The most beautiful story in the world of games! An innovative clicker where you fart and burp your way through earning achievements! Visit Old Mushroom's hut, welcome Fatty and feed him until he explodes! Fart, burp and have a great time!

name: Last One Standing
description: LastOneStanding is an online cooperative third-person zombie shooter game. You will play as a special force soldier, using guns, grenades and whatever you got to kill as many zombies as you can. You can play solo or create a listen server to invite two other friends to take on exciting levels.

name: Remove
description: Let’s recall the memory before the accident and erase the traces of your crime.

name: Fever Pitch Soccer
description: This port features another set of small graphical changes compared to the SNES port, as well as different sound. The port retains the EU title for all regions.

name: Mission Ammunition
description: Sin descripción

name: Jet Eriksen's GBJ Kingdom: 2
description: Return to the kingdom from many years ago, now revamped with more trolls than ever. Can you get past the dangers of the piplups fortified kingdom?

name: Cheetahmen II: Bugfixed Version
description: An improvement mod for Cheetahmen II that fixes most major glitches in the game, including allowing access to the final levels of the game after the level 3 boss.

name: Welcome to the Anime Club
description: Welcome to the Anime Club is a parody mod for Doki Doki Literature Club. The mod features the MC and Monika, who have both had a falling out with each other, fighting over the future of the literature club.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club-Love 3DS
description: Doki Doki Literature Club-Love 3DS is an unofficial homebrew port of Doki Doki Literature Club for the 3DS. The game was ported under the Love Potion 3DS framework.

name: 3DS-Pong
description: 3DS-Pong is a Homebrew version of Pong for the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Pong 3DS
description: Pong 3DS is a Homebrew version of Pong for the Nintendo 3DS which utilizes the 3DS's stereoscopic 3D feature.

name: Super Mario 64 3DS Port
description: Super Mario 64 3DS Port is an unofficial 3DS port of Super Mario 64 using the Mario 64 source code decomp.

name: Sonic.exe The Disaster 2D Remake
description: Sonic.exe The Disaster 2D Remake is adapting and rebalancing well-known Roblox experience (originally created by OutLaikRBLX/OutLaik) in 2 dimensions, adding many additional mechanics and features for gameplay diversity.

name: Not Exactly A Hero: Story game
description: Sick and tired of your usual typical superhero plots full of clichés? Wonder what it's like to live as an everyday citizen in a superhero universe? Play 'Not Exactly A Hero: Visual Novel, Story-driven Adventure Game' and find out!

name: First Encounters
description: Discover mixed reality on Meta Quest 3 with First Encounters. You are on a strange new planet and pesky space puffians are about to flood into your room. Catch as many as you can before time runs out – match colours for a high score!

name: Dragon Quest Champions
description: Sin descripción

name: Glowing Abyss
description: Explore the depths of the ocean as a plankton, revive the decaying sea life, and rescue other plankton. Illuminate the ocean floor and bring life back to it!

name: Genseishin Justirisers: Souchaku Chikyuu no Senshitachi
description:
Genseishin Justirisers: Souchaku Chikyuu no Senshitachi is a Beat 'em Up video game based on Genseishin Justiriser and is a loose adaptation of its first Story Arc.

When Doctor Zora comes to Earth seeking to unseal her master Kaiser Hades and take over the planet, the Justirisers are assembled to stop her and her minions.

name: Burger Saga
description:
Burger Saga is an interactive chat game in which viewers go through various challenges until only one remains! The winner will get the burger.

To join, wait for a game to start and type "!join" in the chat!

name: Thief: The Black Parade
description: The Black Parade is an unofficial expansion for Thief Gold and a love letter to Thief: The Dark Project. Shadows and silence are your allies. Light is your enemy. Stealth and cunning are your tools. And the riches of others are yours for the taking.

name: RoonSehv: NeTerra
description: A Myst-like fan-game based on the story of Myst. The game takes place in the world of Myst in a parallel story of Atrus and his family.

name: Don't Wake Kate!
description: D.W. is thirsty. Help her get as many glasses of water as she can without waking Baby Kate.

name: Dai Sengoku Rance
description: Japanese mod which expands the main story of Sengoku Rance, giving an option to 'continue' onto the main continent after uniting JAPAN.

name: Shine: Kotoba wo Tsumuide
description: Shine: Kotoba wo Tsumuide is a dating sim for the PlayStation 2 about a protagonist who decides to chase his dream of becoming a cameraman and flies towards an island in the Okinawa area to learn with his upperclassman cameraman. On the way to the island, the protagonist was given a very hard assignment to complete: taking a picture of six different girls who hate cameras.

name: Pokémon Mystery Universe
description: A fan-made dungeon crawling roguelike MMO based on the Pokémon Mystery Dungeon games. Become a Pokémon and join hundreds of active players as you explore sprawling regions and treacherous labyrinths.

name: E.T. the Extra Terrestrial: Digital Companion
description: E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial: Digital Companion is a game based on the classic 1982 film E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial. First, E.T. asks you many questions, like your first and last name, zip code, address, and favorite things. Then, a planner is set up that you can use daily. It includes a clock, a calendar, a clock, and a "To-Do List" where you can list tasks that need to be done. You can also print anything that needs to be remembered on the Game Boy Printer.

name: Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Join Pebbles, Bam-Bam, Dino and all your favourite Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs characters in this fun jigsaw puzzle!

name: Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs: Matching Pairs
description: Match the Yabba Dabba Dinosaurs characters and dinosaurs together.

name: X-Plane 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape from Castle Claymount
description: A sinister foe has imprisoned you in a fortress made of clay. Work together with your cellmates to solve the mysteries of this place and Escape From Castle Claymount, the latest escape-the-room game by Colorbomb.

name: Computer Conflict
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Thief
description: Sin descripción

name: Penny Blood: Hellbound
description: Unleash the hounds from hell and fight your way free of this otherworldly prison in a roguelike adventure that explores the world of Penny Blood’s darker side! Can you find the distinction between good and evil…?

name: The Void Equation
description:
30 minutes left until the girl's death...
The Void Equation is a short science fiction visual novel.

name: Pinball Spire
description: Action adventure meets pinball in this one-of-a-kind pinballvania adventure. When a mysterious spire appears from thin air, it's up to an intrepid pinball to bump, spin, shoot, and flip its way to the top and solve the tower’s mysteries!

name: Sanfu
description: A ghost story filled with mystery and investigation.

name: Project_Y: Working Title
description: 360° live-action ghost horror VR. What will befall you when you watch people involved in urban legends?

name: Snowman Story
description: Bundle up and get cozy with this warm winter tale about one snowman's journey to the North Pole. Can he make it there before spring arrives?

name: Connected Clue
description: A detective adventure where you infiltrate the scene to solve the case. Use tools to secure evidence and testimonies.

name: Captain & Company
description: Find fortune, foes, and friends for life in Captain & Company: the ultimate swashbuckling adventure game. Set sail with friends into epic naval battles with massive multiplayer crews, and pillage your way to becoming the wealthiest pirates on the high seas.

name: Visual Pinball X
description: Visual Pinball X is an open source freeware pinball game for PC.

name: Visual Pinball VR
description: A port of Visual Pinball X to VR.

name: Insects Awaken
description: Become a spy in a puzzle-solving adventure between Chongqing and Shanghai. Observe history or weave a new one.

name: Stray Cat Doors 3
description: A stage by stage puzzle adventure with a cute girl with cat-ear hats adventuring in people's dreams.

name: Tidal Therapy
description: Tidal Therapy is a travel novel game for tired adults. A tired office worker heads to the sea. The setting is a quiet and beautiful sea town with a seaside park, warehouse district, and tower condominiums.

name: HackShield
description:
Have you gotwhat it takes to protect yourself and others around you and do you want to learn everything about hacking and safe internet practices? Than you are the Cyber Agent we're looking for!

In HackShield you learn about everything you can do as Cyber Agent to protect your father, mother, siblings and grandparents against cyber criminals. We are counting on you!

name: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double
description: Urban Legend Hunters 2: Double is an immersive adventure game where you investigate urband legends in a modern city.

name: Nico: Ittekimasu no Oheya
description: A small girl named Nico living in your device - live with a program for a short time in this raising simulation

name: Fuyuu
description: A narrative puzzle game that takes place in a small county in China.

name: The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty
description: The Japanese pirates have terrorized the Ming Dynasty for generations. You've devoted your life as a soldier to fighting them.And now you are in their turf, alone with your sword; the last soldier in pirate's land in this 3D-action game inspired by traditional Chinese ink painting landscapes.

name: Whispers of Yashan
description: To find the truth of your old friend's suicide, delve into a strange building in this Chinese-style ghost story card battle RPG.

name: Koginja
description: The game's main objective is finishing the main objective in under 60 minutes of in game time.

name: Hookah Haze
description: It's the year 2xxx. The inexperienced Toru Sumiki lands a job managing Hookah Haze, a new hookah lounge on the outskirts of Akihabara, where he meets three eccentric girls. The story unfolds as the girls gradually open up to him, connecting through their fondness for hookah...

name: Tsumige Shoujo
description: A game about not playing games. An idle game where you interact with 'Tsumire,' a gamer robot, and play your backlog.

name: Mugen Senshi Valis
description: The legend of the Valis Warrior begins here.

name: Mugen Senshi Valis
description: Will you be able to see the true last scene?!

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier II
description: Sin descripción

name: Valis III
description: The battle for everything begins!

name: Super Valis IV
description: A Demon Horde appears from the Red Moon. The bell of battle rings...

name: DavBot
description: Jump, Move & Dash! in DAVBOT, You are Escaping the Paragon City. Collect Coins & Destroy Other Enemies to Win! But... The Boss Won't Let You Escape without a fight.

name: FrankenBob's Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: FrankenBob's Quest Pt 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Exfil
description: In Exfil, you become a member of one of 4 competing teams tasked with retrieving intel. Using GPS skills, your goal is to locate and recover the intel then successfully exfiltrate.

name: The Witch's Bakery
description:
The Witch’s Bakery is a 2D Adventure Puzzle game where you play as a joyful witch who opens a bakery in modern Paris.

She has a special power: she can heal emotions with her bread.

name: Dice Dice Fantasia
description:
Dice Dice Fantasia is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Broccoli, which was released in Japan in 2009.

``Yuhodo,'' which handles systems for numerous card games, is in charge of system design. It's a simple yet deep board game with lots of elements to play with.

In addition, Munetsugu Kusaka, who works on illustrations for light novels and bishoujo games, has been appointed as the character designer and original artist. The theme song will be delivered by a lineup with Elements Garden producing the music and Haruka Shimotsuki on vocals!

name: DokiSui: Doki-doki Suikoden
description: "Doki Doki Suikoden'' is a simulation game released by IREM Software Engineering (IREM) for the PlayStation Portable (PSP) on May 12, 2011 . Irem's abbreviation is `` Dokisui '', and the title logo of the work is a large drawing of these four letters and a matching umbrella .

name: Super "Sonic Saves the World" World
description: Sin descripción

name: Topa ou Não Topa
description: There are 26 briefcases, each one of them containing a different value. The Banker will constantly try to buy your briefcase, but it's up to you to decide whether it's a good choice to sell it. Will you be able to take on The Banker and risk everything for the briefcase containing one million reais?

name: Fight Ippatsu! Juuden-Chan!! CC
description: “Fight Ippatsu! Juuden-Chan!! CC” is an adventure game based on the TV anime based on the original work by Mr. Jitama. The game revolves around the original character "Cell" (CV: Eri Kitamura) created by Mr. Jitama, and includes full voices by the same cast as the TV anime. We use multiple stories and multiple endings, where the story changes depending on which characters you become friends with.

name: O Sombrio: A Voz das Almas
description: O Sombrio: A Voz das Almas is a Brazilian horror game where you take on the role of Amir, a professor at the Center for the Study of Natural Phenomenons. After coming into contact with a book called Sinister Sapiens, you become cursed with something that will make you realize the existence of what many cannot see, hear, or feel. In the story, you'll find letters, documents, and telegrams, which will help understand what happened to you and to many in that town.

name: Oh Balls Merge
description: Drop, merge, score - "Oh Balls" is an addictive game. Merge falling balls to create bigger ones and aim for high scores. Stay alert to prevent the stack from reaching the top. Challenge your skills, chase the highest score, and enjoy the ball-merging frenzy of "Oh Balls"! Install now for endless fun!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 5 - Underground
description:
Catch the train, customize your weapon, and claim your revenge in Chapter 5 - Underground:

Fortnite Battle Royale takes on a striking new appearance in Underground. Discover an entirely new Island with POI's that feature the factions of The Society versus the Underground. Seek your revenge for the kidnapping of poor Peely with an entirely fresh arsenal of weapons and items. And of course with a new season, you’ll find the Big Bang Battle Pass with pages of new cosmetics. Check out the line up of Outfits geared up and ready for action from daybreak until dawn.

name: Tunneling 2048
description: Tunneling 2048 is a variant of 2048 but extra spaces are created every time a new number is added up.

name: 2048 Puzzle: Evangelion Edition
description: 2048 Puzzle: Evangelion Edition is an unofficial 2048 game based on the anime Neon Genesis Evangelion.

name: Apprentice Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Plan Bee
description: This is a little experiment Bennett Foddy made in Pico-8 a while ago on a flight. It uses a control method they hadn’t seen before, where the movement is damped according to the rate of change in the acceleration (the ‘jerk’) which creates a strange oscillating movement.

name: Little Master Cricket
description: Little Master Cricket is Bennett Foddy's attempt to make a cricket game that focuses on compelling gameplay rather than realism or verisimilitude. The real pleasure of cricket is to swing a bat and hit a ball, something that’s missing from every commercial game and most free ones as well.

name: Nintendogs: Shiba & Friends
description: Nintendogs is a realtime pet simulation video game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo DS handheld video game console. It was first released in Japan, and was later released in North America, Australia, Europe, and other regions. It was originally released in three different versions: Dachshund & Friends, Lab & Friends (Shiba & Friends in Japan), and Chihuahua & Friends. It has been re-released twice since then, first as a bundled release with a special edition Nintendo DS with a new version called Nintendogs: Best Friends, and then later as Nintendogs: Dalmatian & Friends.

name: Alex Ferguson's Player Manager 2002
description: Sin descripción

name: Alexandra Ledermann 2: Equitation Competition
description: Sin descripción

name: All-Star Watersports
description:
All Star Watersports lets you 'Ride-the-Barrel' through the most realistic waves yet seen on PlayStation. Grab a surfboard, bodyboard, windsurfer or jet watercraft and carve up some of the most awesome surfing beaches along the coast.

Play with the seagulls and dolphins as you master the skills required for each sport including barrel surfing the surfboard, jibbing the windsurfer, jumping the watercraft and spinning the bodyboard.

You can compete against the computer or up to four players can compete in contests including 'Beach Competition', 'Big Air Contests' and 'Extreme Trick'.

name: Aztec: The Curse in the Heart of the City of Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Beach Volleyball
description: Sin descripción

name: California Surfing
description: Sin descripción

name: California Watersports
description: Sin descripción

name: Castrol Honda World Superbike Team VTR
description: Sin descripción

name: Checkmate II
description: Sin descripción

name: Cindy's Caribbean Holiday
description: Sin descripción

name: Cindy's Fashion World
description: Sin descripción

name: Detective Mouse
description: Sin descripción

name: Maiden's Exhibition: Shoujo-tachi no Danmaku Tenrankai
description: This is spellcard collection for Danmakufu Ph3. There are 108 spellcards in script. You need Danmakufuph3 [.1 pre6] to play.

name: Pombo Piorado 2
description: A Celeste-inspired game.

name: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: A Guerra Galáctica
description: A simple but fun game focused on the Galactic War, where you can choose between the 10 Bronze Saints who participated in the tournament. Other scenarios are also available, but in versus or training mode.

name: The Nefargad
description: The Nefargad is a thriller, horror, puzzle, and storytelling game that offers a true first-person perspective. The game narrates the story of an archaeologist named Mert, who is kidnapped and imprisoned in a dungeon and his efforts to escape.

name: Golden Goal '98
description: Sin descripción

name: King of Bowling 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Quake 3 Rally
description: Quake 3 Rally, also known as Q3Rally, is an open-source combat racing game on the ioquake3 engine, turning the classic Quake 3 into a racing shoot 'em up with many arena and racing gamemodes. Along with a plethora of mods, online support is also available. Q3R is very similar to the Half-Life Rally mod.

name: The Legend of Zelda GBC
description: A Game Boy Color-styled remake of the original Legend of Zelda for the Nintendo Entertainment System for PC and Linux.

name: MILF Next Door
description: The new neighbor needs a tutor for her son... but that's not the only thing she's after!

name: Farm Life
description: Farming game for Nintendo DS published in 2007 for the European market. Developed by Destineer and Black Lantern Studios and published by Ubisoft.

name: Onwelt
description: Indie Sandbox AFK Grinder

name: Little Maddie Dear
description: Little Maddie Dear is a maze-runner game about the journey of little Madison, who wishes to find Paradise at the top of the stairs. The game is set into five main stages each with different themes, an increasing variety of enemy types, and new obstacles, making every stage harder to complete. Players are assisted with up to three different helpful skills unlocked at each stage. Use food items to increase your chances of survival. Monsters lurk at every corner and nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the dark truth or will this end in fantasy?

name: Volcanic Bird: Bird Quest
description: Volcanic Bird: Bird Quest fuses a traditional JRPG combat system with creature collecting and a text-adventure style game structure.

name: Colorfill
description: Fill 80% of the stage with colors while avoiding collisions with enemies in this happy arcade flash game!

name: Slippery Delivery
description: Have you ever wanted to be an extremely slippery fish out of water, well look no further!

name: Aqua Romance: Mermaid Otome
description:
Presented by Storytaco and ENP Games, "Aqua Romance" is a unique high-level romance otome game.
It is a modern fantasy interactive choice game where you can immerse yourself in an enchanting universe filled with thrilling twists.
Write your own romance story in "Aqua Romance"!
(Note: Every choice you make changes the fate of the characters.)

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: Sonic the Hedgehog is a promotional mobile-browser game based on Sonic Superstars. The game was made to promote the December 2023 McDonald's Happy Meal campaign to promote the game.

name: Harmony in the Wild
description: Embark on a magical journey as a young fox in Harmony in the Wild, an enchanting open-world adventure where nature's balance is in your paws. Explore vibrant forests, navigate icy terrains and unravel the secrets of dying nature through various quests to restore harmony back to your new home.

name: Archaic
description: Stranded on an unknown island, you must quickly learn to survive. You will be hunted down by about 50 different prehistoric creatures roaming around the island and its waters! Strive by gathering resources to craft tools and defenses, and by taming dangerous dinosaurs alone or with your friends!

name: Inside The Crystal Mountain
description: Inside The Crystal Mountain is an action adventure game with frenetic combat and some roguelike elements where you explore a mysterious world filled with interesting characters and challenging enemies.

name: Super Waifu Bakery Simulator
description: Launch and manage your own bakery, crafting artisanal goods, satisfying customers, handling crises, and striving for five-star excellence, all while enjoying mini-games and flirtatious encounters!

name: TramCity Hakodate
description: The game is set on the "Hakodate City Tram" in Hakodate, Hokkaido. Players assume the role of a tram operator, transporting passengers to their destinations.

name: Noah City: Rise of the conqueror
description: Noah City:Rise of the conqueror is a SLG game. It takes place in an alternative reality where a great naval war is spreading all over the world. it focus on developing players’ gears and finding a comfortable pace of the gameplay, players who are fond of SLG games, you certainly cannot miss it!

name: Degenheim
description: Dive into a world gone limitlessly mad and slash your way out through hordes of enemies in an action-packed isometric rogue-lite title, where every run offers a unique experience and challenge.

name: Succubus 2069
description: A sensual Souls Like Third Person Shooter. Customize your female protagonist with full body details and sexy outfits. Travel across the futuristic wasteland to defeat the Succubus Queen and rescue the last surviving male to save humanity. Unlock new weapons and succubus mods to grow in strength.

name: Tales from Hazelwood Post
description: When your grandmother falls ill, you return to Hazelwood and unwittingly take over as the new Post Master at the small, dusty post office on the square. The only problem, this town has no street names or addresses. In this cosy puzzle game, solve puzzles, deliver the mail, and reconnect the town.

name: Para: Rime of Zealot
description: Para: Rime of Zealot is a 2D side-scrolling suspenseful thriller adventure game.It is inspired by the ancient mariner's tale.You will take on the role of the protagonist, Lovan, navigating the pressures of survival while uncovering the truth behind the events.

name: Run Tekila Run!
description: Get ready for a fast-paced, magical combat/comedy game battling fearsome zombie hordes!

name: Granite Casket
description: Granite Casket is a claustrophobic horror about crawling with six degrees of freedom through caverns. Careful positioning and awkward angles will be needed to find the crevices within the earth no human was ever designed to go.

name: Hentai: Police Force
description: Embark on an exciting adventure in the vast, sun-soaked landscapes of Hentai: Police Force. As a daring detective in this unique open-world experience, your mission is to locate and interact with three distinct members of the Anime Police Force scattered throughout a sprawling desert city!

name: Family Adventures Paris
description: Join Family Adventures Paris and be part of an incredible journey! Meet the Millers, loving parents Peter and Emily, talented Jessica, and sporty Steven - as they travel to the French capital, exploring the beautiful streets and experiencing the culture, art, and history that Paris holds for them.

name: Project Paws
description: Project Paws is a purr-fectly paced cooperative adventure that will put your stealth and puzzle-solving skills to the ultimate test as you attempt the most daring heist of all

name: Invisible Flow
description: Dig deep into the Invisible Flow, where you'll investigate once-chill Lush Palms island! Gather resources, craft tools and explore the vast map to survive among the Gasmentis. Solve puzzles and unravel the ties between the local lab and the eerie gas lurking around. Find out who's behind it!️

name: The Shaft
description: Mine ore for the federation, kill monsters in dark caves, protect yourself from radiation, but most importantly, DON'T DIE. Dark caves conceal horrifying abominations. Sell the extracted ore at the safe house and buy new equipment and upgrade your unique weapons.

name: Star Crystal Warriors Go!
description: When nightmare monsters invade your city’s dreams, will you heal them with compassion or destroy them with magic? Defeat evil in this magical girl anime!

name: The Phantom Forest
description: Embark on a perilous journey through the haunting Phantom Forest, where survival meets souls-like combat in an open-world adventure. Face nightmarish creatures, build thriving settlements, and unravel the mysteries of a malevolent force.

name: Dawnsbury Days
description: Lead a group of childhood friends through their first adventures in a turn-based tactical RPG played under the rules of PF2E, the second edition of a powerful OGL ruleset. Customize their builds, acquire loot and level up, and ultimately defeat the sinister enemies who threaten your hometown.

name: Reign of the Renegade
description: Reign of the Renegade is a challenging roguelike deckbuilder. Learn Actions, Collect Artifacts, and level up your Character to make powerful synergies.

name: Last Castle Guardians
description: Last Castle Guardians is a minimalist Tower Defense with roguelike elements, bullet hell, and action roguelike, where you must defend the Castle against the hordes of zombies and creatures that seek to destroy it. Buy guardians, choose upgrades, and defend the castle.

name: Security Control
description: Security Control is a 1-4 player co-op and PVP escape room game. You have fallen asleep on your first day of work and now have to evade the security officer to escape or get caught and fired. Hide, run, complete objectives, steal money and escape before you get fired!

name: Dreamshot Fantasia
description: Dive into a fantastical adventure that combines strategic tile-matching puzzle gameplay with authentic 80s anime charm!

name: Cluck Frenzy
description: Cluck Frenzy is a 2-player game that combines CO-OP and PVP to make a wild party game. Grab a friend and collect items to open a chicken coop. In your way is a paranoid farmer protecting his chickens. Once the coop is open, compete with your ex-partner to gather the most chickens for yourself.

name: Dire: Flesh and Phobia
description: Embark on an epic roguelike adventure in "Dire:Flesh and Phobia", where visually spectacular monsters engage in intense card battles. Craft your deck, navigate immersive maps, and conquer foes, culminating in epic boss battles. With unique abilities, strategic deck building, and stunning visuals, Dire:Flesh and Phobia is a thrilling journey to become the ultimate monster master. Are you ready to face the challenge and claim victory in this visually captivating world?

name: Gems Of Evolution
description: Gems of Evolution is a top-down action roguelite featuring 4 elements, 4 races and 4 classes. Choose your unique hero from diverse combinations like Human-Warrior-Fire. Fight, make various builds with skills, items and evolutions, survive 30 wave and uncover your hero's tale in this challenging.

name: Welcome To Eden
description: Welcome To Eden is a narrative driven adventure RPG set in a utopian city, Eden. Take on quests to help your fellow residents, while learning about the more secretive side of Eden in this psychological adventure. And maybe, just maybe, everything isn't as it seems...

name: Live together Now
description:
Live togeter Now is mobile dating sim game.

When I opened my eyes, I suddenly had a girlfriend.
And the beginning of cohabitation.

The player becomes "Yujin", an ordinary college student and a protagonist who has never had a relationship before.
As the boyfriend of the lovely girlfriend "Serin", he works hard and proceeds with the story.

name: Cartridge Monsters: Rebirth
description: Embark on your quest to hunt and capture over 100 powerful Ammons. Uncover your half-ammon, half-human abilities, challenge the Belmonte family's reign, and shape the destiny of the Phantom Island.

name: The Legend of Ogorets 4: Warren
description: An immersive, barebones-style interactive visual novel with choices, lore, and endgames. Not for the faint of heart.

name: Girls Hobby in Love
description: Six girls have a hobby group. One likes to listen to music, another likes to draw, and the third likes to read. Each girl is special in her interests. Which one will you like more?

name: Mono-Space
description: Trapped within a geometrical and mono-chromatic dimension; you stumble upon the "Heart of Corollorum", allowing you to manipulate the colors and objects of the dimension to your will. Can you escape the dimension in one piece in this genre-defying experimental puzzle platformer?

name: Roko's Basilisk
description: You find yourself in a utopian setting, immersed in the matrix of an omnipotent AI that holds all knowledge and wisdom. There is no clarity as to how you got here, but a mission looms before you.

name: KillFish
description: Welcome to KillFish. In this Action/FPS game, you'll dive into a captivating world where robots have taken control on a factory. Embark on an epic adventure filled with a unique hook mechanic that will give you freedom to explore and kill in flashy ways.

name: Finite State Automaton Challenges 2
description: In the second episode of Finite State Automation Challenges, you will use finite-state automata to overcome 40 challenges from character string manipulation, computer science, and mathematics.

name: Lorhaven: Cursed War
description: Lead your castle through the haunted provinces of Lorhaven, where the once-forgotten undead now menace the living. Recruit diverse units and legendary heroes, each strategically countering the encroaching darkness. Immerse yourself and unveil the mysteries of the Cursed War.

name: Curse Errant
description: After a fierce selection, the protagonist Giselle gloriously became a knight of the Mariolu family. But becoming a knight was just the beginning; Giselle's true mission was far more profound and complicated.

name: Project MW
description: "Project MW" is a turn-based RPG game set in a pixelated fantasy world. With the protagonist's team and various other factions in the mix, countless humans flock to the magical mountain, vying for the power to conquer the world.

name: Sidereal
description: A tall man wanders across desolated worlds, stumbling beneath the endless stars.

name: WhiteTrick
description: WhiteTrick is a turn-based multiplayer board game that pits police officers against second-hand dealer fraudsters. White evades the police and commits additional crimes. And the police deployed to prevent his further crimes investigate, find clues, guess his route, and apprehend White!

name: Lottery Winner
description: Lottery Winner is a simulation game that reflect lottery games in real life. You can buy as much lottery as you want to examine your lottery theory or just your luck.

name: Unrivaled Heroes
description: Prepare your 2.5 D beat 'em up side scroller battle for a challenging adventure in medieval aesthetic folklore, where players can learn ancient martial art skills in a progression chapter story to experience the true adrenaline rush from mythical heroes!

name: Deadly Nightmare Unwanted Heritage
description: Deadly Nightmare Unwanted Heritage brings you back to the nightmare world, where your mission it so try and break the curse before 6 AM. In the first Deadly Nightmare game, you played the role of John, but this time around you take the role of his grandmother. Surviving is not easy!

name: Grave Desecrator
description: new in town ready to work in this society that you dont belong, start working as a cemetery watchman discover the tradition of this place, carry yours , learn about the dead ones,experiance emotions that you thought you werent capable...

name: Pigbook
description: A short metroidvania platformer game about a small island of pigs drawn in an worldly events of a new world ruled by a Corporation of a Dragon.

name: Ruff City
description: Grab a friend and dog pile on foes in the action packed 2D adventure!

name: Ninja Kato 2
description: Second in the Ninja Kato series! A side-scrolling 2D action game. Control the robot ninja Kato and train him to become a full-fledged ninja.

name: Rubber Royale: Holiday Prologue
description: Get ready for a frantic experience in this 8-player mayhem of a game. Run, hit, jump and throw your opponents in the wackiest way possible. The only Xmas game that rewards you for being naughty instead of nice.

name: Few Nights More: Genesis
description: ThFew Nights More is a roguelike turn-based RPG based in a world where Vampire Lords seek to conquer lost territories and their place in the world. Design and defend your stronghold, slay your enemies with traps, and fulfill your Lord’s true potential, slowly conquering what is rightfully yours.

name: The Black Guards of Odom: Desert Town Prison
description: You just joined the guards in Odom, a border town full of merchants, travelers, and shady individuals. Soon enough, you'll start climbing the ranks and getting the many perks of a successful career. How far will your ambitions take you?

name: The Last Human: Go!
description: Jump, jump, don't fall! explore and just go up

name: Table Tennis Toon!
description: Table Tennis Toon is a fast-paced table tennis game. Aim with complete freedom and fire the ball with five different types of shot! Choose your character and play solo or against your friends in thrilling and adrenalinic matches. Prevail and conquer the title of "Ping Pong Master"!

name: College Sex: Episode 5
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they go back to their dorm room with their dates after a night of clubbing.

name: Meanwhile in Sector 80
description: As an engineer stranded in an alien star system, scavenge parts and build equipment to fight your way back home. Work with (or against) the laws of physics in Meanwhile in Sector 80 to turn trash into survival.

name: VR TKA Surgery Simulator
description: Get ready to learn all the subtleties of the surgery by practicing it in the applied VR TKA training by Prof. Dr. Ertugrul Aksahin, one of the world's leading orthopedic surgeons!

name: Horror Cam
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure of observation and vigilance in a unique puzzle game. Your task is to closely scrutinize recorded security camera feeds, identifying and rectifying discrepancies. Hone your keen observational skills and strong recall abilities to endure until dawn.

name: The Red Beret
description: This is a story that happened during World War II. As the only survivor of the mission, you need to survive on the island and eliminate the Super Mutants and Nazi Germans

name: Milf Dream
description: Do you want to hook up the hottest moms? We got you covered, mild lovers!

name: Dumball Rush
description: Dumball Rush is an online racing party game from 2 to 8 players with a 3D third person view. The player controls a snowball that is racing against other players. Roll in the snow to be bigger and faster! Avoid obstacles and activate gifts to take advantage and win the race!

name: Nomad Defender
description: How many tries will it take to get back our land? Enter the Kernel - defense simulation to protect the Wirelands. Fight roguelike strategic Tower Defense battles. Upgrade and customize your Turret deck with unique synergies and countless combinations. Do you have what it takes to reach the end?

name: I Want To Go Home
description: I Want To Go Home is a first-person cleaning simulator game with a horror twist. Clean the restaurant and survive to earn money and unlock characters. Play solo or with up to 3 friends and experience the story that unfolds. All content updates will be free!

name: Volunteers
description: Are you ready? You are VOLUNTEERS! You are part of an experiment! Fight, survive and either WIN or LOSE, all of this is up to you and your team. In this fast-paced multiplayer fps, you will have to try to find your way to the victory.

name: Heading Home
description: Join Glyph, an orange robot on a heartfelt adventure around the world seeking safety and happiness. As Glyph traverses the globe collecting the cherished chocolat mint ice cream adored by his girlfriend, he'll realize that home is sometimes not a place but a person.

name: Rabbit Hole
description: Rabbit Hole is an upcoming story-driven - RPG filled with psychological cosmic horrors and then then tightly wrapped in the wackiness of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Wild's Edge
description: You've set up camp at the place where civilization turns into unexplored wilderness. Can you brave the ruthless hinterland to defeat each biome?

name: With Shining Eyes
description: Uncover secrets, experience history, solve puzzles and understand one another. Immerse yourself and explore a surreal and colorful world in this short, first-person adventure.

name: Emotional flow
description: A precision platformer game where there is no jump button!

name: Super Cube 3D
description: Explore beautiful worlds and make new friends in this 3D MMO Platformer.

name: It Was Raining That Night
description: "It Was Raining That Night" is an erotic visual novel that takes you on an adventure in the world of the mafia. With an engaging storyline and attractive characters, you're sure to get lost in the experience. Will you reign supreme or fall?

name: Zegelon: Hardcore Arena
description: Zegelon: Hardcore Arena is a fast-paced competitive multiplayer survival game that offers a strategic battle royale hack & slash experience, where players compete in brutal gladiatorial combat for gold and glory, with no second chances.

name: Offroad VR
description: Offroad VR combines challenging physics-based offroad driving with virtual reality, offering an exciting game that allows players to explore diverse tracks with different vehicles.

name: Boom! Buster
description: An adrenaline rush is part of a balanced breakfast. Boom! Buster keeps you on your toes with fast paced panic inducing gameplay featuring an over-the-top cartoony art style and soundtrack reminiscent of the early 2000s.

name: Dark Sun
description: Accompany a wanderer through their dying world while they prepare to sacrifice their life to save it.

name: Don't Be Sus
description: Don't Be Sus is an immersive first-person action game that lets you explore a beautiful historical town and discover its dark mysteries. Meet whacky characters, eat at restaurants, drink at bars, learn about the local history, find your way into restricted areas and investigate!

name: Thanatophobia
description: Thanatophobia is a survival game in a horrific atmosphere, playable solo or in cooperation with a minimum of 2 players and a maximum of 4 players. Escape unscathed, don't get caught, there won't be a second chance.

name: Neon Goddess
description: Explore a cyberpunk world filled with cosmic horrors as Astrid, a mercenary, confronts the moral dilemmas of this dystopian reality. Your choices shape the destiny in this retro 3D horror game.

name: Renaissance Kingdom Wars
description: Battle across Europe, Africa and the Middle East in this grand strategy & RTS hybrid. The year is 1510, you are one of hundreds of landless mercenary captains. Earn the rank of lord and rise up through your Kingdom's hierarchy to be crowned King and expand your Empire.

name: SkyBound
description: Skybound is an adrenaline-pumping 2D platformer that challenges players to conquer the sky. With precise controls, and perilous obstacles, this game offers an experience where timing and skill determine success. players embark on a journey navigating intricate platforms, and evading hazardous traps.

name: Ink of Fate
description: Explore the world of books, discover its secrets and collect every page in Ink of Fate. A narrative 3D puzzle game in which you will help Helena, a half elf who embarks on a journey to rewrite her destiny and avoid the tragic end imposed on her by her author.

name: Jisatsu
description: Jisatsu is a Japanese found footage mockumentary horror game.

name: Last Caveman
description: What do parachutes, augers and bazookas have in common? They help the "Cavemen", a troop of irresistible fellows with loincloths and three-day beards, to complete their search for a cozy home with as little loss as possible.

name: PolyPine
description: Build your own forest! A simulation sandbox game where you grow plants and design habitats for 100s of species. Click on animals to trigger behaviors: deers poop which fertilizes the soil, bees go looking for nectar. Unlock more plants and animals as you create an increasingly diverse ecosystem.

name: Babava's Playspace
description: Babava's Playspace is a horror puzzle adventure game. In your search for the answer you will have to go through puzzles, difficult moral choices and slip past monsters lurking in the shadows. Are you ready to play outside the rules and win?

name: Lily Fantasia
description: Welcome, to the fantastical and rhythmic world of Lily Fantasia! Join the mysterious vampire, Lily, in a race against time to save your sickened mother. Overcome fierce enemies, wield the magical piano, and become the Rhythm Master you were always destined to!

name: Relic Arena
description: Relic Arena is a roguelike autobattler by Jenkins & SUNSfan for PC/Mobile. Players equip units with historical relics and are led by renowned figures from history. Each relic grants a unit a unique ability, with powerful roguelike upgrades.

name: The Emperor and State
description: This is a turn-based strategy game that simulates the rule of an ancient feudal monarch. It involves the administration, policy adjustment, diplomatic checks and balances, national wars, as well as the emperor's self-cultivation, the cultivation of successors and so on.

name: Lost Harmony
description: Unwind with Lost Harmony, a cozy solar-punk game where you embody a bird soaring through the skies. Explore a beautiful world, Interact with charming animals and Discover the stories humans left behind.

name: MILF's Plaza
description: MILF's Plaza is an erotic visual novel with a non-linear plot in a unique 2D style! The main character, full of ambition and eager for thrills, is ready to do anything to find his place in the sun. But his life is only turning out to be more complicated...

name: Nexus Travelers: Hero of Elocea
description: Travel to another world and save it! Will you be able to win the favor of the princess and her people and get some well-deserved 'rewards'? Visual Novel with quests, turn-based combat and animated, interactive scenes.

name: Fantasy Village Simulator
description: Experience building your own village with different races in a fantasy world! Produce more villagers for various production tasks and train more guards to resist waves of demonic attacks. Plan the production of supplies to create more powerful equipment for the guards to wear.

name: Wolf Knight Memoir
description: Take command of the Wolf Knight to help him remember his dramatic past life through a story driven adventure and test your skills in this challenging Metroidvania game with die and retry platforming features happening in the fantastic 2D hand drawned world of Aurora.

name: Scatch 2: The Painter Cat
description: Scatch 2: The Painter Cat is a puzzle game where the goal is to paint all colorful places of the maze and come to the exit. Combining colors and items with different mechanics on the way.

name: Reach to Tsukuyomi
description: ”Reach to Tsukuyomi" is an exhilarating short 2D action game on a 2D platform. Fight a variety of enemies, powerful bosses, and free your hometown from Yokai in this simple action game. What awaits you at the end of the story, which unfolds in cute dots, can be found at .......

name: Dungeon Vixens: A Tale of Temptation
description: Will you mend your heart or be lost forever in a Vixen filled dungeon of lust and pleasure?

name: One Hour And A Straight Line
description: 1 hour nonstop parkour with musical guns, wall climbing and platform building. Good to relax. Can you make it under 1 hour though?

name: Project Xsting
description: Fight your way through swarms of elite WASP soldiers and bosses using character-specific ranged and melee attacks. Survive by making strategic upgrade choices, using enemy drones to your advantage and overcoming unique stage challenges in the sci-fi survival roguelite, Project XSTING.

name: Mining Mechs: Magnetic Mystery
description: Explore a brand new map and storyline set in the Arctic! Magnetic waves have been detected underground and you know what that means: you need to dig down and find out what's going on. Will you unravel this magnetic mystery?

name: Monti: The Hidden Secret
description: Monti: The Hidden Secret is an action-advanture game set in the world of "Parala" follow her to the journey to find her destiny. Will she uncover the secret of the world?

name: I'll Do It Tomorrow
description: It's Sara's first day of work. However, when she takes the elevator to go to the office, she suddenly finds herself on a mysterious floor. What truth lies behind these weird rooms? Will you be able to move on? Or rather... will you want to move on?

name: Greed Realm: Hero from Another World & the Soul Tree
description: This is an RPG strategy adventure game that incorporates tabletop game elements and uses card construction as the main gameplay.

name: Santa and Present Chaos
description: The boy who succeeded his grandfather as Santa, he gets all his presents stolen a day before Christmas Help the boy get the gift back. Help people by following the story and they will help you, too. Do me a favor, find the whereabouts of the gift and follow it. Have a conversation with the npc.

name: The Mask Game
description: Which is worse: a toxic friend or a literal demon?

name: Pet Rock Duty
description: Ever tried to escape a twisted pocket dimension school building with the exit heavily barricaded while trying to keep a hungry pet rock flesh spider named Bobby content so it doesn't break out of its tank and eat you alive? No? Lord, what are they teaching in school these days?

name: Where's Fido?
description: From the creators of Search & Find - Hidden Objects, Where’s Fido is a relaxing 3D hidden objects journey, where you will be searching and finding lost dogs all around the world.

name: The Descent
description: The Descent, a horror walking sim in Rockwell Mine, immerses players in miners' harsh life and unsettling mine encounters. Play as an investigator uncovering hometown mysteries

name: Ghost Eater
description: third person action RPG with manga inspired graphics

name: Shoot the Robots VR
description: Do you love shooting? What about robots? And what about shooting the robots? In this fast-paced game you have to use a well-aimed shots to neutralize robots which will run away from you in every possible way.

name: Cyan Avenger
description: This is a game that combines bullet evasion, flying shooting, and rhythm music gameplay. There is a unique way of storytelling. You can enjoy the joy of fighting against other spacecraft from a 2D perspective, accompanied by music. The game level belongs to small games.

name: Infinite Robotics
description: Infinite Robotics is a visual novel game that is set in a fantasy world filled with modern technology. The premise of the game is to find out the mystery of the world and learn about electronics by solving puzzles!

name: Christmas Puzzle 4
description: Blast through match-3 puzzles and restore beautiful town in Winterland. Build a cozy little cottage on the hill and a cookie factory, fire up the oven and get baking! Welcome visitors to your town and complete dozens of quests. Winter has tons of fun in stock.

name: The Crimson Maid
description: As a secret celestial curse takes hold of his father, a young cleric finds himself enraptured by the charms of a strikingly beautiful maid. A period drama that combines romance and murder mystery, with a dash of supernatural.

name: Saving Mrs. Hinako
description: In this visual novel by Studio Pork, make a strong-willed yet acquiescent, pure-hearted but rebellious housewife fall in love with you!

name: Neon Geometry Dash
description: Rhythm-based action game with challenging levels and awesome music.

name: Revenge Of The Colon
description: Revenge of the colon is a story driven, single-player, atmospheric, body horror game with multiple endings. Perform colonoscopies on five patients and discover the horrors concealed deep within them. PS1 horror style!

name: Cozy Escapes
description: Experience the uncanny adventure of Cozy Escapes, where the cozy merges seamlessly with mystery in a thrilling cooperative escape. Ready for a puzzle-packed journey with your partner, fueled by the shared desire to escape reality for a cozy moment?

name: Dice Battle
description: Dice Battle is a casual game in which you could act as a rolling dice jumping over your enermy and flatten them in Level or endless mode. Fully control your dice to avoid the barrage and beat the enemy dice.

name: Gun Fighting
description: Gunfighting is a first-person shooter game with a 1v1 simulated combat training concept that takes into account confined environments, such as inside a building, to confront the enemy.

name: Counter Attack
description: Counter Attack is a defense-based first-person shooter where you progress through story-driven missions and fend off incoming enemies.

name: Battle of Fate
description: Battle of Fate is a first-person PvE shooter in which players fend off waves of enemies in a variety of environments created by randomly selecting maps, weapons, monsters, and items.

name: Loop
description: Loop is a puzzle-platform game where you can co-op with your past self through clones that simulate your actions.

name: Sker Ritual: Bloody Night
description: He knows if you've been bad or good! Bloody Night, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Train Simulator Classic: DB BR 218 'V 164'
description: A German diesel legend, the DB BR 218 'V 164' arrives for Train Simulator from Virtual Railroads.

name: Lord of Darkness: Aftermath
description: Lord of Darkness: Aftermath is the second game in the Lord of Darkness series, made in a similar pixel style and JRPG genre. Together with the blue-haired hero and his friends, we have to go on crazy adventures, because the world is in serious danger again.

name: Stratum Descent
description: Stratum Descent: a thrilling rogue-lite card game where you forge customizable cards, navigate through dangerous stratums, and confront powerful stratum lords. Upgrade your character, collect relics, and delve deeper into an ever-challenging journey. How far will you descend?

name: 3D Puzzle: Wild West
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Loose or Escape
description: Loose or Escape is a multiplayer (4 vs 1) funny game where one player takes on the role of the Boss and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to find all the items and escape the terror. If the Boss catches them, their abilities are disabled and they are transformed in a snowman

name: Santa's Chimney Quest
description: Help Santa to deliver at time
