name: Bigfoot's Journey
description:
Learn about a real Bigfoot - a creature that has learned to hide, survive and travel through other dimensions, and guide him through the mazes.

Among the most important events of the twentieth century, three stand out: man went into space; man has been to the moon; the man became convinced that he was not the only possessor of intelligence on Earth.

Years have passed. The planet is in the middle of the 21st century. Humanity is on the verge of extinction. Nuclear winter is raging. Officially, hominology is listed as a pseudoscience, but in fact it is the most important scientific discipline, because the object of its study is real.

name: Slimeboo
description: Boo, a small and adorable slime, has gotten lost on a tropical island. To find his way home, he must leap over all the obstacles in his path. Help him overcome them! Good luck!

name: Binky XXIV: Game Streamer "Binky" Plays Grotto of the Grebulons
description: Sin descripción

name: Rabbit Rabbit UFO
description: Sin descripción

name: Maniac Mansion Mania
description: Maniac Mansion Mania is a series of Fan Sequels created by LucasFan from 2005 onwards. They are based on Maniac Mansion and sometimes Day of the Tentacle. The game involves Maniac Mansion characters in a unique style that is spread out episodically, like a TV series. The episodes are thus arranged in seasons, though there are also non-sequitur specials. Most episodes are comedic.

name: A.N.O.N.Y.M.U.S.
description: Sin descripción

name: Turok Trilogy Bundle
description: Turok is back and no dinosaur is safe! When it was first released in 1997, Turok introduced gamers to a world teeming with cunning enemies, traps, puzzles and deadly weapons all within a vast 3D environment ready to explore.

name: Dino Get Out!
description: Get ready for a unique adventure! Join our jumping dinosaur in his exciting mission to escape from a world full of challenges in this platform game.

name: Stone Age
description: An action game where you command and fight primitive people!

name: LEGO Fun Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: WWE 2K23: Pretty Sweet Pack
description:
Step into the ring with the Pretty Sweet Pack, including Luke Gallows and Karl Anderson, Pretty Deadly (Elton Prince and Kit Wilson), and Tiffany Stratton.

Each playable Superstar also comes with their own MyFaction card.

The Pretty Sweet Pack is already included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: Hitman 3: The Sarajevo Six
description: Get access to the Sarajevo Six Campaign in Hitman World of Assassination and take on six bonus contracts that tell a self-contained side story which revolves around former members of a paramilitary unit called CICADA.

name: WWE 2K23: SuperCharger
description:
The WWE 2K23 SuperCharger unlocks all base game WWE Legends, along with throwback arenas, and more.

The WWE 2K23 SuperCharger is included as part of the Season Pass, and the Season Pass is included in the WWE 2K23 Deluxe Edition and Icon Editions.

name: Escape Room Mega Bundle
description:
Five escape rooms developed by mc2games included!
Wizardry School, Palindrome Syndrome, Tested on Humans, Between Time and Regular Factory.

name: SteamWorld Build & Dig Bundle
description: The ultimate SteamWorld experience. Get your hands on SteamWorld Build, the newest entry in the SteamWorld franchise, as well as the game that started it all, SteamWorld Dig!

name: Phantasie Memorial Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Zi
description: Zi - is a classical casual arcade battle tanks shooter, with realistic 3d physics engine, smart (AI-like) enemies, 'bosses' and map editor.

name: Ultros: Deluxe Edition
description: Ultros: Deluxe Edition

name: Tenement
description: A single player 2D arena shooter against up to 64 AI. Take place in epic Free-For-All battles across 8 stages or work your way through 200 insane missions. You can even create your own game mode with the mission editor.

name: Skyts
description: Have you always dreamed of diving into a world where your creativity and strategic skills are the key to success? Welcome to Skyts, the 2D fighting game that puts your imagination first!

name: Elementals Beta
description: Elementals Beta is a multiplayer roleplay game where you harness the elements of the universe to defeat fearsome enemies and friends.

name: Aviatrix
description: Become the hero of Aviatrix

name: Homeworld 3: Deluxe Edition
description: Homeworld 3 Deluxe Edition includes Base Game and Year One Pass. The Year One Pass includes three DLC drops that expand the co-op War Games mode with new playable factions and artifacts.

name: Homeworld 3: Fleet Command Edition
description: Homeworld 3: Fleet Command edition includes the base game, the Year One Pass, Multiplayer Customization Set, Digital Soundtrack & unlocks access to play 72 hours early.

name: Adventure Bar Story
description: Venture the dungeons throughout the kingdom for ingredients! Cook your way to the be best bar in this bar maneging RPG.

name: WWE 2K23: Race to NXT Pack
description:
The Race to NXT Pack includes the franchise debut of WWE Hall of Famer Harley Race, as well as NXT Superstars Tony D'Angelo, Trick Williams, Wendy Choo, and Ivy Nile.

Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION card.

The Race to NXT Pack is included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: WWE 2K23: Ruthless Aggression Pack
description: Demonstrate RUTHLESS AGGRESSION with the Ruthless Aggression Pack featuring throwback versions of John Cena, Batista, Randy Orton, and Brock Lesnar. Plus, gain access to the WrestleMania 22 arena, and the John Cena Legacy Championship.

name: Inzoi
description: Inzoi is a life simulation game where players become gods within the game, allowing them to change everything as they wish and experience endless new stories in various forms of life.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball
description: A J2ME port of Sonic the Hedgehog Spinball.

name: Pokémon Nightmare Version: Invasion
description:
Overnight, the world lost its connection to Azure City. It seems as if all citizens disappeared in a matter of hours. The public is scared of whatever happened. A terrorist attack? A failed experiment of the GENE Company? Or maybe aliens?

A team of policemen go to Azure City. Only 4 of them come back after realizing that they can't find their colleagues. The investigation posed more questions than answers.

After a month of silence, a young investigator named Jack heads for Azure City. His goal is to solve the case once and for all, no matter what it takes. Why is he trying to accomplish what a team of policemen failed to do? Why is he risking his life for such a feared case? Is he going to make it out alive?

name: R-Type
description: R-Type is a remake of the original R-Type, bundled in the R-Type Dimensions collection.

name: R-Type II
description: R-Type II is a remake of the original R-Type II, bundled in the R-Type Dimensions collection.

name: Master of Music
description: Play through the world of the Master of Music as a young bard setting out to explore new territory using his trusty lute and the power of music to destroy his enemies.

name: Boomerang
description: You control a boy walking through a platform maze trying to collect items while being chased by enemies. They can be killed by using the boomerang. The boomerang has a limited range and, if thrown, must always picked up. It will not return to you.

name: Detective Masochist 3: The Case of the Naked Truth
description:
Our setting is the venerable city of Kanazawa...

Our protagonist is the (Acting) Director of a Private Detective Agency, tasked with keeping peace in this fair city. As a detective, he's still a little green, but as a super-masochist, he's top-notch!

His brave assistant is one Satomi Komatsu. The two of them have gotten wrapped up in a case involving strange rings. One such ring has twisted Satomi physically and mentally, and at times she transforms into a super sadist herself!

Our hero investigates the rings hoping to return Satomi to normal, but he just can't quite crack the case. Troubles plague him during his investigation, first when he takes another case by the well-endowed erotic novelist Kiriko Noto, and then when the Agency is taken over by the beautiful and mysterious Regina Kaga.

A detective story filled with ups and so, so many downs!! And that's even before the Queen of Dawn, an assassin for the sinister Association, shows up!

What will tomorrow bring for a man who can never improve as a detective and can't stop improving as a masochist?!

name: Color Ball
description: Color Ball is an Action game, published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1984.

name: League of Legends: Esports Manager
description: LoL Esports Manger is an official mobile game that brings the thrilling world of esports management to your fingertips. Themed around the popular MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena) game, League of Legends (LoL), this title allows players to step into the shoes of an esports manager, overseeing teams and strategies in the competitive LoL scene.

name: Cute Bendy and The Projectionist
description: Sin descripción

name: Gang Man
description:
In Gang Man, you play a desperado on the run from the law after your latest villainous escapade. Rival armed gang members are hot on your trail, and it's a case of shoot or be shot. You control the motion of the getaway car as it speeds down a straight highway. The opposing cars have gang members leaning out of their windows to shoot at you either vertically or horizontally. You can also shoot back, and the direction of your shot will be opposite the one in which your car last moved. Once you have killed all your pursuing enemies, the level is complete.

The first level requires you to defeat only one opponent to complete the level. Subsequent levels add opponents and increases the frequency of their gun-shots. Multiple foes can appear on screen simultaneously, and defeating them before the timer runs out gives you bonus points. Additional points can be scored by collecting loot which randomly appears on the road as you drive by. If you are shot, you loss one of your three lives. Once you have used those up, it is game over.

name: Space Invasion
description: Space Invasion is a variant of Space Invaders. It has most of the features of the original arcade game with the player moving left and right while shooting at the invaders.

name: After Fright
description: Discover what happened after the fire

name: Precipitous
description: 6 vanilla maps made for PafWADMo 2021

name: Confusion Constructions
description: A somewhat unusual E1 replacement for limit-removing Doom 1.

name: Based Refueling
description: Oh boy, it's another Refueling Base remake! An aggressive, limit-removing, single player take on the original with similarly open-ended and challenging gameplay in more modern terms.

name: Alice Clancy's Shattered Dimensions
description: A nine map wad Made from scratch inspired by Megawads such as Eviternity, Ancient Aliens and Taransman's Projectile Hell. It follows Alice Clancy, a rookie marine who guards a new portal created by the UAC that allows them to go to other dimensions, but an accident happens and she gets transported to that dimensions where demons struck a deal with a cult of foul creatures known as the Serpanteens, after the first encounters with them She finds out that they made a deal with them to conduct a secret experiment, that acquires creating a new powerful monster, Alice needs to figure out the secrets of the Research and try to stop this powerful monster before he enters and destroy her Home Dimension.
